name: Facepunch GDi Theme
description: This is no longer of use. GDi is gone. rip in feces gdi Requested by GDi users, I made this. Post that started it: http://facepunch.com/showthread.php?t=1276674&p=41517515&viewfull=1#post41517515 Please note that since I couldn't make it to work in GDi only, it works everywhere on Facepunch. Also make sure you read additional info. Things not working (feel free to try and help): Big titles won't overlap the post content
additional_info: When installed, make sure you click on Edit on the style, then on the bottom select URLs on the domain and to the right of it insert 'facepunch.com' without quotes, click add and save (to the upper left).
